{{Infobox tvseason | image = | season_name = Casualty'' series 10 | show_name = ''[[Casualty (TV series)|Casualty]]'' | bgcolour = #FFCC66 | fgcolour = #ffffff | dvd_release_date = Unknown | country = [[United Kingdom]] | network = [[BBC]] | first_aired = {{Start date|1995|9|16|df=y}} | last_aired = {{End date|1996|2|24|df=y}} | num_episodes = 24 | prev_series = [[Casualty (series 9)|9]] | next_series = [[Casualty (series 11)|11]] }} The tenth series of the [[United Kingdom|British]] [[medical drama]] [[television series]] ''[[Casualty (TV series)|Casualty]]'' commenced airing in the United Kingdom on [[BBC One]] on 16 September 1995 and finished on 24 February 1996.[http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0096555/episodes#season-10 IMDB Casualty Series 10] Notable events of the series include Ash's marriage to Laura, Baz's affair with Charlie, Baz's pregnancy, and a gas explosion.[http://www.bbc.co.uk/drama/casualty/pastseries/series10.shtml]


==Cast== *[[Derek Thompson (actor)|Derek Thompson]] as Charlie Fairhead *[[Julia Watson]] as Barbara "Baz" Hayes *[[Clive Mantle]] as Mike Barratt *[[Sorcha Cusack]] as Kate Wilson *[[Jason Merrells]] as Matt Hawley *[[Ian Bleasdale]] as Josh Griffiths *[[Lisa Coleman (actress)|Lisa Coleman]] as Jude Korcarnik *[[Sue Devaney]] as Liz Harker *[[Craig Kelly (actor)|Craig Kelly]] as Daniel Perryman *[[Lizzy McInnerny]] as Laura Milburn *[[Robert Duncan (actor)|Robert Duncan]] as Peter Hayes (Episodes 2-20) *[[Jane Gurnett]] as Rachel Longworth (Episodes 1-21) *[[Patrick Robinson (actor)|Patrick Robinson]] as Martin Ashford Patrick Robinson departed from the series in Episode 24. He would later return to Casualty in 1998 for a guest appearance in the Series 12 story, Everlasting Love which saw characters Charlie and Baz finally tie the knot. ==Episodes== {| class="wikitable"
